duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement industry best practices and standards related to process safety management (PSM).
Audit existing PSM Programs to identify gaps from OSHA’s 29 CFR 1910.119 and Recognized and Generally Accepted Good Engineering Practices (RAGAGEP).
Identify and implement cost effective/value-forward solutions to meet clients’ PSM needs.
Prepare, facilitate, and write reports for Process Hazard Analysis (PHA) such as HAZOP, LOPA, What-if, FMEA, and HAZID.
Red-line and/or develop process and instrumentation diagrams (P&IDs), equipment datasheets, cause and effect charts, and other relevant technical documents.
Advise and mentor junior engineers in developing process safety procedures, guidelines, and documentation.
Quality assure reports and documentation for regulatory compliance and client deliverables.
Conduct process safety training and awareness sessions for employees and clients.
Understand and comply with all safety procedures that govern the work being performed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Chemical Engineering or a related field from an accredited college or university.
